name: Thinkalink YearData
author: Thinkalink Web Design

sections.description: Thinkalink YearData allows you to use the [thinkalink_yeardata] shortcode to show the current year.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.8 or greater
  • PHP version 7.4 or greater

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in plugin installer, or extract the zip file and drop the contents in the “wp-content/plugins” directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Use the [thinkalink_yeardata] shortcode anywhere on your website to show the current year.
sections.faq:
How do I use the plugin?

Install and activate the plugin, and then use the [thinkalink_yeardata] shortcode anywhere on your website to show the current year.
